Title: AN ACT AMENDING ACT NUMBERED ONE HUNDRED AND TWENTY-ONE, EXTENDING THE PROVISIONS OF THE PROVINCIAL GOVERNMENT ACT TO THE PROVINCE OF LEYTE.
Data:
[ Act No. 385, April 09, 1902 ]
AN ACT AMENDING ACT NUMBERED ONE HUNDRED AND TWENTY-ONE, EXTENDING THE PROVISIONS OF THE PROVINCIAL GOVERNMENT ACT TO THE PROVINCE OF LEYTE.
By authority of the President of the United States, be it enacted by the United States Philippine Commission, that:
Section 1. Section two of Act Numbered One hundred and twenty-one, extending the provisions of the Provincial Government Act to the Province of Leyte, is hereby amended by increasing the salary of the provincial governor and the salary of the provincial treasurer to three thousand dollars per annum each, in money of the United States.1a—àphi1
Section 2. The public good requiring the speedy enactment of this bill, the passage of the same is hereby expedited in accordance with section two of "An Act prescribing the order of procedure by the Commission in the enactment of laws," passed September twenty-sixth, nineteen hundred.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect on its passage.
Enacted, April 9, 1902.
